text: Chris Evans is ready to take his partnership with wife Alba Baptista from the audition reads to the big screen. The actor revealed he would “love to” work with the Portuguese actress professionally in a recent interview. The Captain America star also disclosed that he already helps Baptista, 27, prepare for auditions. So, what more did Evans say about the possibility of working with his wife ahead? Here’s everything to know. Chris Evans says he ‘would absolutely love to’ work with wife Alba Baptista The Materialists actor is ready to collaborate professionally with his wife, who is a talented actress herself. In a recent Vanity Fair interview, Chris Evans discussed the pair’s creative chemistry. When asked if he would consider working with Alba Baptista, the Marvel alum gushed, “I would absolutely love to. I work with her all the time on her auditions.” He also explained that it “took a while” for her to feel comfortable running her lines with him. Evans noted, “That took a while for her to be comfortable with—letting me not just read with her, but give opinions and thoughts and watch the takes back. But we’re so good now. I actually think we work quite well together.” The Ghosted actor also paid a compliment to his spouse’s acting style. He mentioned, “I think she takes direction incredibly well.” He ultimately said he’d be “thrilled” to work with Baptista. Chris Evans and Alba Baptista initially sparked dating rumors in 2021 when she followed him and his family members on social media. In November 2022, he further “confirmed” the dating rumors when he commented on the Warrior Nun actress’ Instagram post. Months later, a source told US Weekly that the duo has “gotten serious.” The insider explained, “This is the most committed anyone can remember him being in a very long time, if not ever.” Evans and Baptista tied the knot in September 2023 in Cape Cod. The 44-year-old actor talked about his “newly married status” at New York’s Comic Con panel in October. He addressed the fans and announced, “I got married.” Evans further revealed that they had one ceremony on the East Coast and one in Portugal.
